mapper.select: select * from post where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or #{search} is null order by reg_date asc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from post where title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or #{search} is null
mapper.insert: insert into post (user_no, category, title, content, author, views, reg_date, udt_date) values (#{user_no}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{views}, #{reg_date}, #{udt_date})
mapper.update: update post set category = #{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, author = #{author}, upt_date = #{udt_date} where post_id = #{post_id]}
update post set views = views + 1 where post_id = #{post_id}
mapper.select: select * from comment where post_id = #{post_id} order by reg_date asc
